title: Digital Content Management Solutions Manager
summary: Imagine what you could do here! The people here at Apple don’t just create products — they build the kind of wonder that’s revolutionized entire industries. It’s the diversity of those people and their ideas that inspires the innovation that runs through everything we do...
description: Take ownership for identifying DCM’s barriers to scaling production operations and ideating on opportunities where technology can dramatically help with solving those challenges...
preferred_qualifications: Extensive business process mapping experience including facilitation of cross-functional workshops and/or customer focus groups. Experience with survey design principles and standard methodologies...
pay_benefits: At Apple, base pay is one part of our total compensation package and is determined within a range. This provides the opportunity to progress as you grow and develop within a role. The base pay range for this role is between $133,900 and $201,300, and your base pay will depend on your skills, qualifications, experience, and location. Apple employees also have the opportunity to become an Apple shareholder through participation in Apple’s discretionary employee stock programs...
